Name: Acute Sense
Description: Make Perception Tests to detect imperceptible details using one sense.

Name: Adrenaline Acceleration
Description: Your speed is Fast when Fleeing or being Pursued.

Name: Agile Attacks
Description: Use Agility Bonus instead of Strength Bonus for Subtle melee weapons.

Name: Air of Authority
Description: Make a Challenging (+0) Presence or Rapport Test to gain +1 Influence with a group.

Name: Ambidextrous
Description: No penalty for using your off-hand. Wield a melee weapon and pistol without penalty.

Name: Applied Anatomy
Description: Increase Critical Hit/Wound severity by your Advances in Medicae.

Name: Artistic
Description: Gain +2 SL to Tests in Literature, Painting, Music, or Theatre.

Name: Attentive Assistant
Description: Use Help Action without Advances. Gain +1 SL if you have Advances.

Name: Blank
Description: Immune to Psychic Powers, cannot be detected by Psyniscience, and cause discomfort to psykers.

Name: Bone Breaker
Description: Break bones of Restrained targets, causing Disadvantage.

Name: Briber
Description: Advantage on Intuition (People) Tests for bribes. Reduce bribe cost by 10% per Rapport Advance.

Name: Bulwark
Description: Defend both an ally and a Zone or two allies while using a shield and Defend Action.

Name: Burglar
Requirement: 1 Advance in both Athletics and Stealth
Description: Advantage on Tests for breaking, and entering.

Name: Chirurgeon
Description: Become able to use Chirurgeon's Kit. Perform surgeries and gain Advantage when treating Critical Wounds in combat.

Name: Close Quarters Discipline
Requirement: 2 Advances in both Discipline and Ranged
Description: No Disadvantage on Ranged Attacks within Immediate Range.

Name: Combat Master
Description: Count as one more person for outnumbering in combat.

Name: Condemn the Witch
Description: Deny the Witch causes Wounds equal to the Warp Rating of the power.

Name: Contortionist
Description: Advantage on Tests to resist or end Restrained Condition or grapples.

Name: Counter Attack
Description: Deal Damage to an opponent after winning an Opposed Melee Test.

Name: Coup de Gr√¢ce
Description: Take 2 turns in a row when dominating with 2+ Superiority.

Name: Data Delver
Description: Advantage on Tests to retrieve or analyze information. Read text twice as fast.

Name: Deadeye
Description: +1 SL on Ranged Attacks when Aiming.

Name: Dealmaker
Description: Gain benefits in negotiations: bribes, discounts, or increased sale prices.

Name: Demolition Specialist
Description: Remove Unstable Trait from explosives. Increase Damage by Intelligence Bonus.

Name: Devoted Servant
Description: Gain Advantage on Tests related to your chosen service expertise.

Name: Directed Strikes
Description: No Disadvantage when taking the Target Location Action.

Name: Dirty Fighting
Description: Inflict Blinded or Deafened. Inflict Stunned with +3 SL.

Name: Disarm
Description: Disarm an opponent instead of dealing damage. Gain the object with +4 SL.

Name: Disturbing Voice
Description: +2 SL to Presence (Interrogation) and (Intimidation). -2 SL to Fellowship Tests with disturbed targets.

Name: Distracting
Description: Impose Disadvantage on a Test once per encounter. Gain additional effects with upgrades.

Name: Drilled
Description: Advantage on Tests to resist Frightened. Gain +1 SL for each ally with Drilled in the same Zone.

Name: Dual Wielder
Description: No Disadvantage when attacking with two melee weapons.

Name: Duellist
Description: All non-Subtle One-handed melee weapons count as having the Defensive trait. Can be retaken twice to gain Duellist Feint and Duellist Guard.

Name: Eidetic Memory
Description: Recall visual details perfectly. No Tests needed for memory recall.

Name: Ever Vigilant
Description: +1 SL to detect hidden enemies. No penalties from Unconscious or Blinded while sleeping.

Name: Exploit Vulnerability
Description: Choose Hit Location of your first attack after using Know Thy Foe.

Name: Extended Proprioception
Description: Ignore Blinded in Pilot Tests. Detect vessel size/position in surroundings.

Name: Faithful (Imperial Cult)
Requirement: Adeptus Ministorum OR 2 Advances in Lore (Theology) OR +2 Ministorum Influence
Description: Manifest faith for bonuses. Gain SL equal to Willpower Bonus in Tests.

Name: False Retreat
Description: Feign cowardice to reposition. Hide and relocate within Long Range.

Name: Familiar Terrain
Description: Gain Advantage on Stealth and +1 Armour in chosen terrain type.

Name: Fated
Description: Gain 1 point of Fate. Can only take this Talent once.

Name: Field Medicae
Description: Heal Critical Wounds in combat. Difficulty cannot exceed Challenging (+0).

Name: Flagellant
Description: Advantage on resisting pain/interrogation. Ignore Critical Wounds temporarily.

Name: Flanking Fire
Description: Bypass Cover Armour by 2 when targeting enemies in the same Zone as allies.

Name: Flesh is Weak
Description: Can graft augmetics equal to double your Toughness Bonus.

Name: Forger
Requirement: 2 Advances in both Linguistics and Lore
Description: Forge documents to gain Influence. Influence depends on Test difficulty.

Name: Forbidden Knowledge
Description: Access one Forbidden Specialisation: Linguistics, Lore, or Medicae.

Name: Frenzy
Description: Enter a frenzied state. Immune to Frightened. Gain Strength Bonus +1.

Name: Full-Auto Fanatic
Description: Spend double bullets for Rapid Fire to target all individuals in Close Range of the target with Spread Trait.

Name: Gallows Humour
Description: Use Charm to stabilize allies. Remove Fatigued, Frightened, or Dying Conditions.

Name: Gothic Gibberish
Description: Confound targets with nonsense. Stun them if they fail opposed Rapport Test.

Name: Guardian
Description: Defend allies in Medium Range. Move to defend without Disadvantage.

Name: Gunslinger
Description: No Disadvantage when attacking with two ranged weapons simultaneously.

Name: Hatred
Description: Wield your fury as a weapon. Choose the object of your hatred. Difficult (-10) Discipline (Composure) Test to avoid being overcome by hate. Advantage on Discipline (Fear) Tests and +1 SL to attack Tests against the hated group. Must attempt to destroy the hated group. Can attempt another Discipline Test at the end of each turn to end the effect.

Name: Hit and Run
Description: As a Free Action, when you deal one or more Wounds, make a Reflexes (Acrobatics) Test to Disengage and move to an adjacent Zone.

Name: Holdout Expert
Description: Conceal one small item. Hard (-20) Awareness (Touch), Dexterity (Pickpocket), or Logic (Investigation) Test to discover. Challenging (+0) if technology is used.

Name: Hypno-Indoctrination
Description: Roll twice on the Random Talents Table. You now have those Talents. Can only be taken once.

Name: Icon Bearer
Requirements: 1 Advance in Lore (Theology) and 1 Advance in Presence
Description: Allies within Medium Range gain the icon's benefit when you hold a Holy Icon.
Requirement: 1 Advance in Lore (Theology), 1 Advance in Presence

Name: Ignorance is my Shield
Requirements: Less than 30 Intelligence, cannot have Advances in any (Forbidden) Specialisation
Description: +4 SL on Tests to resist Corruption, psychic powers, and daemonic forces. -4 SL on Tests related to researching Daemons, psykers, and xenos.

Name: Inspiring Presence
Description: Allies in your Zone gain Advantage on Discipline Tests.

Name: Inheritor
Requirement: Must be taken at character creation
Description: +1 Influence with an appropriate Faction, potential Inheritance (5,000 solars). May have access to specialisations or be a member of xenos-tainted bloodlines (GM's discretion).

Name: Lawbringer
Description: +SL to Rapport or Presence Tests when referencing broken laws, equal to Advances in Lore (Imperium).

Name: Lickspittle
Description: Advantage on Tests to ingratiate oneself with a superior.

Name: Martyrdom
Description: +SL to Tests equal to Willpower Bonus when suffering from an untreated Critical Wound.

Name: Medicae Maverick
Description: Action: Turn a Major Break into a Minor Break or fix a Minor Break instantly. +1 Critical Wound, but negates Break effects.

Name: Mental Fortress
Description: Gain Armour equal to Willpower Bonus against psychic powers. Mind cannot be read.

Name: Mimic
Requirement: 2 Advances in both Awareness (Sound) and Rapport (Deception)
Description: Imitate a person's voice after hearing them speak. Cannot mimic unknown languages.

Name: Overseer
Description: Use a Challenging (+0) Leadership Test to let an ally use your Skill for their next Test.

Name: Pathologist
Description: Gain Advantage when performing autopsies to determine cause of death or imbalances.

Name: Phlebotomist
Description: Inflict Bleeding Condition instead of damage with a successful melee attack.

Name: Porter
Description: Double your Strength Bonus for carrying capacity. Add Toughness Bonus to Encumbrance.

Name: Psychic Castigation
Description: Deal Wounds to psykers equal to SL difference when resisting psychic powers.

Name: Psychic Flood
Description: Gain Warp Charge equal to Willpower Bonus. Add +1 SL per Warp Charge to Tests.

Name: Psyker
Description: Gain Minor Psychic Power and one Psychic Discipline. Unlock Psychic Powers.

Name: Quickdraw
Description: Draw and fire a Pistol before anyone else. Requires Hard (-20) Reflexes Test if Surprised.

Name: Rapid Reload
Requirement: 2 Advances in both Dexterity and Ranged
Description: Reload weapons faster. Choose a ranged Specialisation to reload as a Free Action.

Name: Read Lips
Requirement: 1 Advance in both Awareness (Sight) and Linguistics
Description: Understand speech by observing lip movements, even without hearing.

Name: Registered Trader
Requirement: 2 Advances in Logic (Evaluation) and 2 Advances in Rapport (Haggle)
Description: Sell items at 100% base cost. Administratum may request a tithe Between Missions.

Name: Sanctioned Psyker
Requirement: The Psyker Talent. Only during character creation.
Description: Immune to unsanctioned penalties. Gain symbol of sanctioned status.

Name: Secret Identity
Description: Maintain a false identity. Gain +1 Influence with chosen Faction when dressed appropriately.

Name: Shock Assault
Description: Take 2 Actions during a Surprise Round.

Name: Skulker
Description: Avoid detection when following someone using Navigation (Tracking).

Name: Slippery
Description: Opponents attacking you when moving out of Engagement have Disadvantage. Take twice to disengage as a free action.

Name: Superior Commander
Description: Use your Action to direct allies. Allies can Move or take an Action immediately.

Name: Suppressing Fire
Description: Use Rapid Fire to suppress ennemies.

Name: Sure-Footed
Requirement: 1 Advance in each of Athletics, Fortitude, and Reflexes
Description: Gain Advantage on Tests to resist being moved or knocked Prone.

Name: Tactical Movement
Requirement: 1 Advance in both Athletics and Discipline
Description: Take Cover as a Free Action.

Name: Tenacious
Description: Make a Challenging (+0) Fortitude Test to recover from Stunned immediately.

Name: Two-Handed Cleave
Description: Gain Spread Trait with Two-handed melee weapons. Additional effects on subsequent purchases.

Name: Unflinching Presence
Description: Make a Hard (-20) Presence Test to avoid losing Superiority.

Name: Unremarkable
Requirement: No Advances in Presence or Presence Specialisation unless randomly acquired.
Description: Blend into crowds without Tests. Gain Disadvantage on Tests targeting high-status individuals.

Name: Void Legs
Description: Immune to void-sickness. Gain additional benefits when taken multiple times.

Name: Well-Prepared
Description: Once per mission, find a piece of equipment in your inventory. Deduct its cost from Solars.

Name: Amalanthian Apprentice
Description: Spend Fate point to make a Rapport Test with a representative of an Imperial Faction. On success, target becomes a contact.

Name: Familiar Bonded
Description: Bond with a Regular Familiar. Can be taken multiple times. Subsequent picks allow bonding with Cyber/Psyber-Familiars, then remaining types.

Name: Gut Instinct
Description: Spend 1 Fate Point for a GM hint during an investigation or research.

Name: Hardened Suspicion
Description: +1 SL on Awareness and Intuition Tests against xenos and Chaos-aligned creatures.

Name: Inspired Defiance
Description: Advantage on Fortitude and Discipline Tests against Corruption.

Name: Logical Liar
Description: Spend 1 Fate Point to use Intelligence instead of Rapport for Deception Tests.

Name: Many Masks
Description: Advantage on Disguise Kit Tests. Additional picks grant 'Fall Guy' (burn disguise, reduce Subtlety loss) or 'Unmasked' (surprise in combat).

Name: Security Augur
Description: Advantage on Tests to identify or interact with security systems. Additional pick allows erasing evidence of breaches.

Name: Shadow Operative
Description: Ignore Disadvantage on Stealth Tests due to Subtlety.

Name: Subtle Influencer
Description: Negate first Subtlety loss when requisitioning aid from Factions.

Name: Subtle Mutation
Description: Roll on Subtle Mutations Table for Positive and Negative Mutations. Can replace Corruption Mutations with Subtle Mutations.

Name: Subtle Psyker
Requirement: Willpower 40, Psyker Talent, 3 Advances in Psychic Powers
Description: Roll Psychic Phenomena with +10. Challenging Stealth Test to prevent Subtlety loss from psychic powers.

Name: Tainted Vessel
Description: -1 SL on Fellowship Tests, Immune to Corruption Mutations, +1 SL on Awareness to detect daemonic entities, Immune to possession by the same daemon.

Name: Unwavering Will
Description: Spend 1 Fate Point to double Willpower Bonus for the encounter.

Name: You Didn't See Anything
Requirement: 2 Advances in Logic (Investigation), Stealth, or Tech (Security)
Description: Negate Subtlety loss after encounters. Logic (Investigation) for physical evidence, Stealth for movement, Tech (Security) for device sabotage.
